DocLocalization.Name: FestkÃ¶rper - Entlang einer Polylinie extrudierte Kreisscheibe

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The fillet that is equally applied to all transitions between the segments of the IfcPolyline, providing the geometric representation for the Directrix. If omited, no fillet is applied to the segments.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectRadii
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If a FilletRadius is given, it has to be greater or equal to the Radius of the disk.

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixIsPolyline
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Directrix shall be of type IfcIndexedPolyCurve with no Segments, or of type IfcPolyline.
DocWhereRule.Expression: ('IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCPOLYLINE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix)) OR (('IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCINDEXEDPOLYCURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix)) AND NOT(EXISTS(SELF\IfcSweptDiskSolid.Directrix.Segments)))
